observation: Home - Texas Public Charter Schools  Join Login Sign Up Search for: Facts & Research Fact Sheets Research For Advocates & Lawmakers Advocates Lawmakers Who We Are Support TPCSA Events & Training Provide High Quality Education Our Mission ACTION ALERT: HB 1707 will be voted on the Senate floor very soon. It's time to make sure your voice is heard! contact your lawmaker Annual Texas Public Charter Schools Association Conference: Making Bold Moves Learn More Special Education Students Thrive at Texas Charter Schools Check Out The Facts Support the Texas Public Charter Schools Association Donate Today Understanding Governing Boards Of Read More Teach Like A Champion: Lessons From Their Work With Harmony Public Charter Schools Next Prev 1 2 3 Public Charter Texas Public Charter Schools Provide High Quality Education Annual Texas Public Charter Schools Association Conference: What is a Charter School? Public charter schools are tuition-free, open-enrollment public schools that have the flexibility to adapt to the educational needs of individual students, while held to strict state academic and financial accountability standards. Click Below To Get Started I am a Lawmaker I am an Advocate Why Join TPCSA? TPCSA’s mission is to support and advocate for a policy and regulatory climate that ensures every student in Texas has access to ever-improving public school options. Charter school advocates share their stories and make their voices heard to help advance pro-charter policies throughout the state. Learn more and sign up to become an advocate here! Member Resources. Become a Member What We Do Policy & Research Advocate Resources Charter Facts Action Center Charter Schools need YOU Open a Charter School The Texas Public Charter Schools Association (TPCSA) is committed to helping aspiring charter operators navigate the complex process of applying for and subsequently opening a charter school. How To Apply Public charter schools vary in mission and model, serving a diverse range of Texas students. Looking for a school in your area or want a school by a specific mission type? Find a School Careers Annual Conference Donate Charter Central Contact TPCSA 512-584-8272 | 3005 S Lamar Blvd, Suite D-447, Austin, TX, 78704 user lock book map-marker twitter facebook envelope linkedin youtube-play instagram Notifications
